Rulings.Edison:
●You can activate “Spirit Force” to prevent damage, even if you don’t have a Warrior Tuner to return to your hand.
●“Spirit Force” does not target; you select the Warrior Tuner during resolution.

PSCT.Base: During your opponent's turn, at damage calculation: Make the battle damage you take from this battle 0, then you can add 1 Warrior-Type Tuner monster with 1500 or less DEF from your Graveyard to your hand.
